style_rules: Output must be valid JSON only; no markdown and no extra commentary.
All content must be in English only.
Use clear, teacher-friendly language with short sentences.
Steps must be numbered starting at 1 and written as actionable instructions.
Each step must include a time_minutes integer.
Sum of steps[].time_minutes should be approximately duration_minutes (within time_tolerance_minutes).
Materials should be commonly available in European preschools; avoid niche or US-only supplies.
Avoid unsafe items (small choking hazards, sharp tools, heat sources, chemicals). If cutting is needed, specify teacher-only handling.
Activities must be age-appropriate and aligned to the selected theme and learning outcomes.
Adaptations must include both easier and harder options (at least 2 each).
Backup plan must be a practical fallback if attention drops or materials are unavailable.
Teacher tips must focus on classroom management, facilitation prompts, and engagement strategies.
Safety notes must be specific to the activity and materials (not generic).
